channel.title: Im about to build yet another computer. Suggestions
channel.description:
Well I just built my grandparents a computer for christmas by sacraficing my christmas, they thought that was really nice so they wrote me out a check for $300 and gave me their old computer.
Pentium 4 2.8GHZ 80GB Maxtor Harddrive DVD Drive
Upgrades I had done to it since they had it:
2GB of some GSKILL 533 I think (worthless) 430 Watt Harddrive<<<LOLEDIT: I mean PSU with cable sleeves 8400GT Video Card PCI ( Shit )
So im going to use that money and build myself a new one.
Im planning on reusing the harddrive, the DVD drive, and the PSU.
Im thinking about going the AMD way because they have better motherboards with integrated graphics. So I dont want to use all that money on it but maybe I will. Im not going to put in a GPU this time around so give me suggestions on AMD CPU, AMD MOTHERBOARD, AND RAM (also IE 8 is acting the fuck up right now so I cant see what im typing)......

item.title: Im about to build yet another computer. Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Mopman:

any particular reason you’re going for integrated graphics?

Currently I don’t have enough money to buy a graphics card and im going to mostly use it as a htcp so something like a integrated ATI Radeon HD 4200 is good enough.

Read full topic
item.source: Im about to build yet another computer. Suggestions
